name: Sail&Save
description:
Sail & Save is a new addictive 3D game, featuring splashy levels, zen gameplay, and sunny colors!

How to play:
-Swipe the screen to control the boat;
-Rescue the swimmers & collect the coins;
-Try to avoid the obstacles!

Features:
-Shiny & sunny graphics;
-Satisfaying and zen gameplay;
-Easy to pick up;
